title: President appoints Mansoor Usman Awan as Attorney General for Pakistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 23 (APP): President Arif Alvi on Friday approved the appointment of Advocate Supreme Court Mansoor Usman Awan, as Attorney General for Pakistan.
The president also accepted the resignation of Ashtar Ausaf Ali from the post of Attorney General.
The president gave the approval under the Article 100 of the Constitution.
